name: bionic armor
description: A strong and lightweight protective suit that combines superalloy and Kevlar. It protects you firmly against physical factors.

name: enhanced bionic armor (off)
description: A tough and lightweight protective suit that combines superalloys and Kevlar, this is a gem that should be called Survivor Power Armor. Power for normal operation is supplied by Solar and Ratchet.

use_action.need_charges_msg: The system started for a moment... and then went silent.

name: enhanced bionic armor (on)
description: A tough and lightweight protective suit that combines superalloys and Kevlar, this is a gem that should be called Survivor Power Armor. The built-in mechanism that is activated strengthens the cardiopulmonary function and can exert greater power than usual.

name: bionic helmet
description: A tough, lightweight protective helmet that combines superalloys and Kevlar. It protects you firmly against physical factors.

name: bionic mask
description: A tough, lightweight protective mask that combines superalloys and Kevlar. It protects you strongly from various environmental factors besides physical factors.

name: enhanced bionic helmet (off)
description: A tough and lightweight protective helmet that combines superalloys and Kevlar, it is a gem that should be called Survivor Power Armor. By activating various expansion systems installed inside, it is possible to operate under various environments.

use_action.need_charges_msg: The system started for a moment... and then went silent.

name: enhanced bionic helmet (on)
description: A tough and lightweight protective helmet that combines superalloys and Kevlar, it is a gem that should be called Survivor Power Armor. It operates the built-in expansion system and is capable of aiming assistance, loud protection, and underwater activities.

name: bionic gloves
description: A pair of superalloys and Kevlar combined with a strong, lightweight arm covering the entire arm. It protects you firmly against physical factors.

name: enhanced bionic gloves (off)
description: A tough and lightweight pair of superalloys and Kevlar combined with a further improvement to the hand, this is a gem that should be called Survivor Power Armor.

use_action.need_charges_msg: The system started for a moment... and then went silent.

name: enhanced bionic gloves (on)
description: A tough and lightweight pair of superalloys and Kevlar combined with a further improvement to the hand, this is a gem that should be called Survivor Power Armor. The embedded electronic auxiliary system enables accurate operation and does not disturb the operation at all.

name: bionic boots
description: A tough, lightweight protective boot that combines superalloy and Kevlar. It protects you firmly against physical factors.

name: enhanced bionic boots (off)
description: A tough and lightweight protective boot that combines superalloys and Kevlar, it is a gem to be called Survivor Power Armor. When activated, it activates the lower limb operation support device.

use_action.need_charges_msg: The system started for a moment... and then went silent.

name: enhanced bionic boots (on)
description: A tough and lightweight protective boot that combines superalloys and Kevlar, it is a gem that should be called Survivor Power Armor. The lower-limb aiding device is in operation and helps more accurate avoidance and positioning.

name: bionic duster
description: A carbon fiber and Kevlar composite coat for ease of movement and accommodation.

name: enhanced bionic duster (off)
description: A specially made coat that incorporates superalloy point armor and a whole-body dielectric device into the bionic coat. By activating the dielectric device, the wearer can be protected from electrical damage.

use_action.need_charges_msg: The system started for a moment... and then went silent.

name: enhanced bionic duster (on)
description: A specially made coat that incorporates superalloy point armor and a whole-body dielectric device into the bionic coat. The dielectric device is activated and can protect the wearer from electrical damage.

name: bionic transport frame (off)
description: It is a modified version of the transport frame for Power Armor so that it can be used alone. It is currently without power.

use_action.need_charges_msg: The system started for a moment... and then went silent.

name: bionic transport frame (on)
description: It is a modified version of the transport frame for Power Armor so that it can be used alone.

name: inner armored suit (off)
description: A thin, strong Myamar inner suit covering the entire body. The artificial muscles are not powered and do not perform as expected. Power supply is started by starting up.

use_action.need_charges_msg: The system started for a moment... and then went silent.

name: inner armored suit (on)
description: A thin, strong Myamar inner suit covering the entire body. Electric power is supplied to the artificial muscles, and the original performance is exhibited.

name: enhanced bionic armor (off) (UPS)
description: A tough and lightweight protective suit that combines superalloys and Kevlar, this is a gem that should be called Survivor Power Armor. Power for normal operation is supplied by Solar and Ratchet. It has been modified so that UPS can supply power.

use_action.need_charges_msg: The system started for a moment... and then went silent.

name: inner armored suit (off) (UPS)
description: A thin and strong inner cover made of Myamar fiber that covers the entire body so that it can be fed by UPS. The artificial muscles are not powered and do not perform as expected. Power supply is started by starting up.
